title: Average annual passenger numbers in UK airports as of 2013
summary: This statistic presents the annual passenger , voip service , and Birmingham_Airport app numbers rate in UK as of the 3rd quarter of 2013 .
The most used annual passenger was London_Heathrow with a 70 millions numbers rate followed by London_Gatwick with 34 millions .
A The information presented is an extrapolation of data gained during a survey and represents users ' own claimed activity .
gold: This statistic shows average annual passenger numbers in United Kingdom ( UK ) airports as of 2013 . With a yearly average of 70 million passengers London Heathrow was the most frequented UK airport , followed by London Gatwick with 34 million passengers and Manchester Airport with 20 million .
